Welcome.title: Welcome to Safa Residency
Welcome.subtitle: Experience Unmatched Luxury at Safa Residency
Welcome.description: Your gateway to world-class hospitality in the heart of Dhaka. Just minutes away from the airport and train station, Safa Residency offers a blend of comfort, luxury, and unforgettable experiences.

checkInOut.question: What are the check-in and check-out times at Safa Residency?
checkInOut.answer: The check-in time at Safa Residency is 3:00 pm and the check-out time is 12:00 pm.

pets.answer: The pet policy at Safa Residency is: Pets Not Allowed (Pets are not allowed.)

Welcome.title: Welcome to Safa Residency
Welcome.subtitle: Uncover elegant Safa Residency Suits
Welcome.description1: Find modern elegance in our exquisitely designed Dhaka hotel rooms and suites
Welcome.description2: Enjoy striking design accents and smart technology like flat-screen TVs in all of our accommodations
Welcome.description3: Take in panoramic views from our spacious Dhaka hotel suites, boasting floor-to-ceiling windows

workSpace.question: What are Do the rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka have a work space?
workSpace.answer: No, the rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka do not have a work space.

rollawayBeds.question: Are rollaway beds permitted in any of the rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka?
rollawayBeds.answer: No, the rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka do not permit rollaway beds.

fridge.question: Do the rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka have fridges?
fridge.answer: yes, rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka have fridge.

teaMaker.question: Do the rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka have coffee/tea makers?
teaMaker.answer: Yes, rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka have coffee/tea maker.

hairDryers.question: Do the rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka have hair dryers?
hairDryers.answer: Yes, rooms at Safa Residency Dhaka have hair dryers.
